text:
THE OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY
Howard L. Bevis, President
COLUMBUS 10
BROADCASTING STATION WOSU AND WOSU-TV
820 Kc. 5 Kw.
WOSU-FM 89.7 Me. 14 Kw.
WOSU-TV CHANNEL 34
Robert C. Higgy, Director
November 19, 1954
Mr. Frank E. Schooley,
Director,
Office of University Broadcasting,
University of Illinois,
Urbana, Illinois.
Dear Frank;
I have your two letters re the Engineering
Committee and subscription television. I will be happy
to serve on the Engineering Committee again and do what
I can for NAEB.
I do not feel at this time that the subscription
television matter is clear enough to warrant any definite
stand by NAEB. It may have very important implications
for educational television but at the moment I certainly
would not know what kind of a stand to take. I would most
certainly not want to oppose it at this stage nor make
any strong plea for it. I think we will do well to
sit by for awhile yet.
With kindest regards.
Director
RCH/mg
Copy to Mr. Carl Menzer,
WSUI,
University of Iowa,
Iowa City, Iowa.
